label: General Writing Exam Rubric (B2 & C1)
zero_rules: Plagiarism or copying from another source
Off-topic: writing about a different topic than assigned

grammar.name: Grammar
grammar.description: Tenses, subject/verb agreement, negatives, and structures seen in class.

bands.description: No grammatical errors or only 2-3 minor errors. Excellent tense agreement. Uses 4+ structures taught in class.
Almost no grammatical errors (3-5 minor errors). Correct tense agreement with few mistakes. Uses 3 structures taught in class.
A few grammatical errors (6-9 no basic) and use of few structures seen in class (2). Good tense agreement with mistakes.
Several grammatical errors (10-15 almost no basic ones) and only uses 1 structure seen in class. Tense agreement is not correct.
Many grammatical errors (15 or + and basic ones) and no use of any structure seen in class. There is no tense agreement.

vocabulary.name: Vocabulary
vocabulary.description: Correct words and vocabulary taught in class.

bands.description: Excellent use of vocabulary taught in class (10+ correct words).
Good use of vocabulary taught in class (7-9 correct words).
Correct use of vocabulary seen in class (5-6 vocabulary words).
Correct but few use of vocabulary seen in class (3-4 words).
Incorrect or no use of vocabulary seen in class (0-2 words).
Hardly any spelling errors (0-2). No errors that impede communication.
Some spelling errors (3-5). Errors do not impede communication.
Number of errors 6-8 that do not impede communication.
Errors may obscure communication at times. Spelling errors of 8-10.
Frequent errors that obscure communication. Many spelling errors (10 or more or basic ones).

mechanics.name: Mechanics & Punctuation
mechanics.description: Correct use of commas, periods, capitalization, and sentence boundaries.

bands.description: No punctuation errors or only 1-3 minor errors.
Almost no punctuation errors (3-5 minor).
A few punctuation errors (5-10 and almost no basic ones).
Many punctuation errors (10 or + 20 basic ones).
Lack of punctuation difficult to understand because of it. (20 or + including basic ones).

fluency.name: Fluency
fluency.description: Organization and logical flow of ideas.

bands.description: Well-organized, coherent, and easy to follow. Valid ideas clearly connected.
Mostly clear organization. Valid ideas organized logically.
Inadequate organization or development. Structure of the answer(s) is (are) not easy to follow. Mainly valid ideas organized adequately.
Organization and structure detract from the answer(s). Choppy, ideas organized inadequately. Communication or purpose of writing sometimes obscured; repetitive.
Text is not structured. Confusing, ideas disconnected; lacks logical.

layout.name: Layout & Follow Specs
layout.description: Structure, paragraphs, length, and cohesive devices (transition words, pronouns, synonyms).

bands.description: Excellent text structure. Length within target range (10-13 words under OR 10-15 words over). Uses 6+ transition words.
Good structure. Length slightly off target (14-15 words under OR 16-20 words over). Uses 5 transition words.
Several inconsistencies in text type requirements. The length is not the one asked (16-17 words less or 21-25 words more). Uses cohesive devices (4 transition words) but in a repetitive way.
Barely meets text type requirements. The length is not the one asked (18-19 words less or 26-30 words more). Incorrect use of cohesive devices (3-2 transition words).
Does not meet text type requirements (20 or more words less or 31 or more words more). Attempts at appropriate writing are unsuccessful or inconsistent. No use of cohesive devices.

content.name: Content & Information
content.description: Completeness and relevance of ideas and supporting information.

bands.description: Considerable variety of ideas. All content points elaborated and clearly connected to main topic.
Several valid ideas. Most content points elaborated and relevant.
Some valid ideas. Some content points elaborated. Main ideas stand out but choppy.
Limited variety of ideas. Hardly any content points elaborated.
Insufficient treatment of topic, no content point elaborated. Information has nothing to do with the main topic.

A1.name: A1 - Beginner
A1.description: Very lenient grading - communication success valued over accuracy

expectations.grammar: Basic sentence patterns, many errors expected and acceptable
expectations.vocabulary: Simple everyday words, basic word choice praised
expectations.error_tolerance: High tolerance - 15+ grammar errors acceptable if meaning is clear
expectations.complexity: Simple sentences and basic connectors sufficient for top scores

A2.name: A2 - Elementary
A2.description: Lenient grading - focus on basic communication effectiveness

expectations.grammar: Basic tense usage, some complex structures emerging, errors common
expectations.vocabulary: Everyday vocabulary for familiar topics, simple word choices accepted
expectations.complexity: Simple and compound sentences, basic transitions expected

B1.name: B1 - Intermediate
B1.description: Balanced grading - accuracy becoming more important

expectations.grammar: Most basic structures correct, some complex structures attempted
expectations.vocabulary: Good range for familiar topics, some sophistication emerging
expectations.complexity: Mix of simple and complex sentences, clear organization expected

B2.name: B2 - Upper Intermediate
B2.description: Standard grading - good accuracy expected with some flexibility

expectations.grammar: Complex structures mostly correct, few basic errors acceptable
expectations.vocabulary: Wide range with some sophisticated choices, generally accurate
expectations.complexity: Complex sentences and sophisticated organization expected

C1.name: C1 - Advanced
C1.description: Strict grading - high accuracy and sophistication expected

expectations.grammar: Complex structures correct, minimal errors, advanced patterns expected
expectations.vocabulary: Sophisticated and precise word choices, wide range expected
expectations.complexity: Sophisticated expression, complex argumentation, advanced organization

C2.name: C2 - Proficient
C2.description: Very strict grading - near-native performance expected

expectations.vocabulary: Precise, nuanced vocabulary choices, advanced range required
expectations.error_tolerance: Very low tolerance - 0-2 grammar errors maximum
expectations.complexity: Native-like sophistication in all areas required
